sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-row>
    <v-col
      md="3"
      sm="6">
      <v-select
        v-model="initialValue"
        :items="plans"
        :item-text="name"
        :menu-props="{ bottom: true, offsetY: true }"
        label="Select Plan"
        dense
        outlined
        tile
        color="secondary"></v-select>
    </v-col>
  </v-row>
</template>
<script>
export default {
  name: 'PlanSelectList',
  props: {
    plans: Array,
  },
  data() {
    return {
      selectedPlan: 'Bob',
      initialValue: 'Alaska',
    }
  },
  computed: {
    firstPlan() {
      console.log('firstPlan: ', this.plans[0].name)
      return this.plans[0].name
      // this.selectedPlan = this.plans[0].name
    }
  },
  mounted() {
    // console.log('mounted: ', this.plans[1].name)
    // this.initialValue = this.plans[0]
  },
}
</script>
<style lang="">
    
</style>
